uvi.description:
net: ll_temac: Make sure to free skb when it is completely used

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.46 by commit 019ab7d044d0ebf97e1236bb8935b7809be92358. For more details please see the references link.
